attributes.additional_details: See above - this man is incredible!
attributes.background: This is a man who at nearly 100 years old is still serving his country. It is truly incredible what he is doing and I believe this would be a great way to celebrate it!

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
